channel.title: Shop.cfg need help with errors
channel.description:
I'm trying to fix my shop and it's kinda edentical to the other shops just other id's for items and i get an error here is the error:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1000 1325 1 000 1329 1000 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.world.ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:147) at server.world.ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:45) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:62) Press any key to continue . . .
Here is the line: shop = 7 Weapon_shop 2 2 1323 1000 1325 1000 1329 1000 1331 1000 1333 1000 4587 1000 1215 1000 1309 1000 1313 1000 1315 1000 1317 1000 1319 1000 1305 1000 5698 1000 1434 1000 1203 1000 1207 1000 1217 1000 1209 1000 1211 1000 1213 1000 3204 1000
P.s these item codes are in just 1 line

item.title: Shop.cfg need help with errors

item.description:
@OGolemX wrote:

When you code, dont use the spacebar, press tab to separate them. Its obv…

item.title: Shop.cfg need help with errors
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“InvisionThePro, post:3, topic:496609”]What do u mean i’m goin to hold the tab button where is says tab?
gimme a example of my codes?[/quote]

What he means is Weapon_Shop [PRESS TAB] 2 [PRESS TAB] 2 [PRESS TAB] # [PRESS TAB] and just keep going like that, after every item id you put [PRESS TAB] then put the amount [PRESS TAB] and etc, so instead of pressing [SPACE] multiple times to get the gap in between the numbers, just [PRESS TAB] and it will do it for you.

Here this is the fixed version:

shop = 7 Weapon_shop	2	2	1323	1000	1325	1000	1329	1000	1331	1000	1333	1000	4587	1000	1215	1000	1309	1000	1313	1000	1315	1000	1317	1000	1319	1000	1305	1000	5698	1000	1434	1000	1203	1000	1207	1000	1217	1000	1209	1000	1211	1000	1213	1000	3204	1000

Read full topic

item.title: Shop.cfg need help with errors
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

Use the tab key.
shop[space]=[space]#[tab]#[tab]#[tab]# on and on.

Read full topic
